package_name: IEEE 34 node islanding with Artificial Neural Network
author: Typhoon HIL
description:
Description: In this example, the use of an artificial neural network (ANN) for islanding detection in an IEEE34 bus system is shown. The example demonstrates the training and testing processes of an artificial neural network (ANN), and its implementation for islanding detection. This example comes with an application note, which can be found here: IEEE 34 node islanding with implemented Artificial Neural Network (ANN)

Organization: Federal University of Rondonia

Example Authors: Adailton Braga Júnior (adailtonjn68@gmail.com), Beatriz Cristina Reis Cordeir (beatriz.cristina.240@gmail.com)

Professors: Ciro Egoavil (ciro.egoavil@unir.br), Antonio Ricciotti (acdricciotti@unir.br)

Typhoon Awards Program: 10for10, 2019.
